effect_entries.effect:
This Pokémon has 1.5× its [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} if any friendly Pokémon has []{ability:plus} or []{ability:minus}.

This bonus does not count as a [stat modifier]{mechanic:stat-modifier}.  If either ability is disabled by []{move:gastro-acid}, both lose their effect.
effect_entries.short_effect: Increases [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has []{ability:plus} or []{ability:minus}.

effect_entries.effect: Powers up only when paired with []{ability:plus}.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
プラスかマイナスがいると
特攻が　あがる。

Boosts the Sp. Atk stat if another
Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

Aumenta l’Attacco Speciale se ci
sono Pokémon con Meno o Più.

Potencia el At. Esp. si algún otro
Pokémon tiene Más o Menos.

Erhöht den Spezial-Angriff, wenn
Plus oder Minus vertreten sind.

Augmente l’Attaque Spéciale si
un Pokémon a Minus ou Plus.

プラスかマイナスがいると
とくこうが　あがる。

Ups Sp. Atk if another
Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

Pokémon has Plus or Minus.

Augmente l’Atq. Spé. si un
Pokémon a Minus ou Plus.
